item.description:
"Building Value Into the Creative Process"


Jaye Donaldson, President and CEO of The Donaldson Group, Avon, CT, will speak on the fundamentals of developing value in your services as a solo creative professional. Whether you are a photographer, writer, illustrator or designer, you can learn ways to position your creative talent as an asset to your clients. Bring your questions. Suzi Edwards, WallFly Marketing, will moderate.

To sign up, send $24.00 by Sept 19th to:
suzi@group88.us. Be sure to reference "ICC Sept 23rd" in the subject line.

group.name: Independent Creative Club of Greater Hartford

item.name: Building Value Into the Creative Process
